name: Zombie Survival (Sasha9p)
description:
Zombie Survival

This is a simple 2d top-down shooter where you have to kill zombies and live as long as possible.

Godot Rumble Game Jam #0 

  • Theme: Madness Everywhere 
  • Link: https://itch.io/jam/godot-rumble

Godot v3.5.2

Controls

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

Credit

Music - https://sebaravila.itch.io/fps-industrial-game-music-pack

The sound of a revolver - https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-second-authentic-gun-sounds-pack

The sound of a shot and reloading a shotgun - "Chaingun, pistol, rifle, shotgun shots" by Michel Baradari licensed CC-BY 3.0 https://opengameart.org/content/chaingun-pistol-rifle-shotgun-shots
